item.title: Emacs org agenda
item.author: rinetd@163.com (rinetd)
item.description: org-download-image-dir "~/Dropbox/org/statics" org-download-image-html-width 600 dropbox-org-directory-path "~/Dropbox/org/notes") (setq org-directory "~/Dropbox/org") org-default-notes-file "~/Dropbox/org/Temp.org" (setq org-directory "~/Dropbox/org") org-agenda-files (find-lisp-find-files "~/Dropbox/org/" ".org$")

item.title: Emacs org capture的启用设定
item.author: rinetd@163.com (rinetd)
item.description:
(setq org-capture-templates '( ("t" "Todo" entry (file+headline "gtd.org" "待办事项") "* TODO %?
 %i
" :empty-lines 1) ("x" "NEXT" entry (file+headline "gtd.org" "下一步行动") "* NEXT [#B] %?
 %i
" :empty-lines 1) ("m" "MAYBE" entry (file+headline "gtd.org" &quo

item.title: Emacs笔记
item.author: rinetd@163.com (rinetd)
item.description: 1. 关于Emacs EMacs 是一个 Lisp 解释器，是 Elisp Macros 的缩写。用 /高德纳/ 的话讲，用 EMacs 按键就像弹琴。没错，使用Emacs，你经常需要按 Esc + Meta + Alt + Control + Sh

item.title: spacemacs 启用字典
item.author: rinetd@163.com (rinetd)
item.description: (defconst jerry-packages '( chinese-pyim-greatdict )) (defun jerry/init-chinese-pyim-greatdict () (use-package chinese-pyim-greatdict) ) ;;; init-chinese.el --- 中文输入法 ;;; Commentary: ;;; Code: ;; chinese-fonts-setup -- 中文字体问题 (use-package chinese-fonts-setup ;; :disabled t :if (window-system) :demand t :config (chinese-fonts-setup-enable) (setq cfs-use-face-font-rescale t) ) ;; chineas-pyim -- 中文输入 (use-package chinese-pyim :disabled t ;; :demand t :config ;; 使用based

item.title: spacemacs 如何自定义engine搜索
item.author: rinetd@163.com (rinetd)
item.description: spacemacs 如何自定义engine搜索 方式1 .spacemacs (defun dotspacemacs/user-config () ;; 1. 定义搜索引擎 (defengine spotify "https://play.spotify.com/search/%s") ;; 2. 添加搜索引擎 (add-to-list 'search-engine-alist '(spotify :name "Spotify" :url "https://play.spotify.com/search/%s")) ) 方式2 自定义layer中配置 appleshan/my-spacemacs-config: My personal Spacemacs config (defun appleshan-programming/post-init-engine-mode ()

item.title: 文本编辑 Emacs
item.author: rinetd@163.com (rinetd)
item.description: treemacs 替换neotree 侧边栏 linum-mode显示侧边栏的行号。 f - 处理文件相关的库 s - 处理字符串相关的库 ag - 据说比ack更快的文本搜索工具

item.title: 文本编辑 Emacs Elisp
item.author: rinetd@163.com (rinetd)
item.description: interactive 可以控制要接受的参数的位置 (defun send-message-to-function (a) (interactive "p") (message (format "%s" a))) 这么写的话就可以通过C-u 12 函数的快捷键将数字12传递给函数了。如果是用helm调用的话要输入

item.title: 文本编辑 spacemacs
item.author: rinetd@163.com (rinetd)
item.description: ivy： 去掉 [SPC SPC] counsel-M-x命令行中自动添加的^符号 ;; (setq ivy-initial-inputs-alist nil) (evil-global-set-key 'visual (kbd "C-") 'mc/mark-all-like-this-dwim) (evil-global-set-key 'visual (kbd "M-") 'mc/mark-all-symbols-like-this-in-defun) (evil-global-set-key 'visual (kbd "C-<") 'mc/mark-previous-like-this) (evil-global-set-key 'visual (kbd "C->") 'mc/mark-next-like-this) (evil-global-set-key 'visual (kbd "C-M-<") 'mc/skip-to-previous-like-this) (evil-global-set-key 'visual (kbd "C-M->") 'mc/skip-to-next-like-this) (evil-global-set-key 'visual (kbd "C-S-SPC") 'mc/skip-to-next-like-this)

item.title: 文本编辑 spacemacs
item.author: rinetd@163.com (rinetd)
item.description: appleshan/my-spacemacs-config: My personal Spacemacs config dotspacemacs/.spacemacs at master · pandemie/dotspacemacs 安装 & 使用 sudo apt-get install emacs $ git clone https://github.com/syl20bnr/spacemacs ~/.emacs.d git clone https://github.com/syl20bnr/spacemacs.git ~/.emacs.d -b develop git clone https://github.com/zilongshanren/spacemacs-private.git ~/.spacemacs.d/ 如果使用了 .spacemacs.d 目录来保存你的 spacemacs 配置，就不需要在 HOME 目录维护一个 .spacemacs 文件了。 至于
